explanations.reason: The paper focuses on comparing the effects of country-based and global financial factors on Islamic stock market returns in BRIC and G7 countries using the method of moment quantile regression (MMQR). It does not mention or involve any machine learning techniques, neural networks, deep learning, or related concepts listed in the keywords. The study is purely econometric and financial in nature, analyzing stock market returns and financial indices without any reference to computational or machine learning methods.
